summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5271 for the improvement of West Charlestown Street (north side), from 46th Avenue Southwest to 55th Avenue Southwest, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 60977, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
